author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Returns summary information for a given MD5, SHA1 or SHA256 hash, and all reports generated for any environment ID.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-scan

commands.description: Submits a file from the investigation to the analysis server. The minimum required authorization is "default".
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-submit-sample

commands.description: Performs a search on the database using the Hybrid Analysis search syntax.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-search

commands.description: Submits a file for detonation in Hybrid Analysis.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-detonate-file

commands.description: Returns the state of the file submission.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-get-report-status

commands.description: Submits the URL of a website, or the URL that contains the file, for analysis.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-quick-scan-url

commands.description: Submits The URL of a website or the URL that contains the file, for analysis.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-submit-url

commands.description: Returns a list of available scanners.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-list-scanners

commands.description: Returns the scan results of the given URL ID.
commands.name: hybrid-analysis-quick-scan-url-results

integration.description: Fully automated malware analysis with unique Hybrid Analysis.
integration.name: Hybrid Analysis

playbook.description:
Detonates one or more files using the Hybrid Analysis integration.
Returns relevant reports to the War Room and file reputations to the context data.
All file types are supported.
playbook.name: Detonate File - HybridAnalysis

playbook.description: Use this playbook to run quick-scan command with generic-polling
playbook.name: Hybrid-analysis quick-scan

description: Fully automated malware analysis with unique Hybrid Analysis.
name: Hybrid Analysis
